languages.text: {n}Маражай проходит между загадочных ксеносских аппаратов, прикладывает ладонь к одной из странных фигур, напоминающих тумбу — и та вдруг с шипением распечатывает одну из своих граней, словно шлюз. Друкари начинает изучать содержимое контейнера — в тишине слышно, как он что-то со стуком и звоном перекладывает. Тем временем ваш взор невольно привлекают загадочные устройства, которыми полнится зала.{/n}

{n}Marazhai strides among the mysterious xenos devices and presses his palm to one of the strange pieces resembling a pedestal — with a hiss, one of its sides suddenly opens like an airlock. The Drukhari begins to examine the contents of the container — the thuds and clangs of objects being moved about ring harshly in the otherwise silent space. Meanwhile, your eyes are involuntarily drawn to the peculiar devices that fill the room.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай проходит между загадочных ксеносских аппаратов, прикладывает ладонь к одной из странных фигур, напоминающих тумбу — и та вдруг с шипением распечатывает одну из своих граней, словно шлюз. languages.text: {n}玛拉斋大步走到神秘的异形装置之间，将手掌按在其中某个类似基座的古怪装置上。装置发出了嘶嘶声，侧口突然像气闸一样打开了。玛拉斋检查起了装置中的东西。在寂静的空间之中，各种物件被挪动时发出的叮当声与砰砰声显得格外刺耳。与此同时，你的目光不由自主地被满屋子古怪的装置所吸引。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai strides among the mysterious xenos devices and presses his palm to one of the strange pieces resembling a pedestal — with a hiss, one of its sides suddenly opens like an airlock. The Drukhari begins to examine the contents of the container — the thuds and clangs of objects being moved about ring harshly in the otherwise silent space. Meanwhile, your eyes are involuntarily drawn to the peculiar devices that fill the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋大步走到神秘的异形装置之间，将手掌按在其中某个类似基座的古怪装置上。装置发出了嘶嘶声，侧口突然像气闸一样打开了。玛拉斋检查起了装置中的东西。在寂静的空间之中，各种物件被挪动时发出的叮当声与砰砰声显得格外刺耳。与此同时，你的目光不由自主地被满屋子古怪的装置所吸引。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、謎の異種族の装置の間をドンドン進み、台座のような奇妙な部品のひとつに手のひらを押し当てるーーシューという音とともに、本体の一箇所がバッとエアロックのように開いた。デュカーリはコンテナの中身を調べ始める。物体を動かしてドスンドスンという音が、静まり返った空間に激しく響き渡る。そんな中で、部屋中に溢れる奇妙な装置に思わず目が釘付けになってしまう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai strides among the mysterious xenos devices and presses his palm to one of the strange pieces resembling a pedestal — with a hiss, one of its sides suddenly opens like an airlock. The Drukhari begins to examine the contents of the container — the thuds and clangs of objects being moved about ring harshly in the otherwise silent space. Meanwhile, your eyes are involuntarily drawn to the peculiar devices that fill the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、謎の異種族の装置の間をドンドン進み、台座のような奇妙な部品のひとつに手のひらを押し当てるーーシューという音とともに、本体の一箇所がバッとエアロックのように開いた。デュカーリはコンテナの中身を調べ始める。物体を動かしてドスンドスンという音が、静まり返った空間に激しく響き渡る。そんな中で、部屋中に溢れる奇妙な装置に思わず目が釘付けになってしまう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai camina con paso firme entre los misteriosos artilugios xenos y aprieta la palma de la mano contra algo parecido a un pedestal; con un siseo, uno de los laterales de la pieza se abre deslizándose como una esclusa de aire. El drukhari examina el interior del receptáculo; el estrépito que causa al remover su contenido resuena con más fuerza de lo normal en la silenciosa estancia. Entretanto, tu mirada se ve atraída involuntariamente por los peculiares artefactos que ocupan la sala.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai strides among the mysterious xenos devices and presses his palm to one of the strange pieces resembling a pedestal — with a hiss, one of its sides suddenly opens like an airlock. The Drukhari begins to examine the contents of the container — the thuds and clangs of objects being moved about ring harshly in the otherwise silent space. Meanwhile, your eyes are involuntarily drawn to the peculiar devices that fill the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai camina con paso firme entre los misteriosos artilugios xenos y aprieta la palma de la mano contra algo parecido a un pedestal; con un siseo, uno de los laterales de la pieza se abre deslizándose como una esclusa de aire. El drukhari examina el interior del receptáculo; el estrépito que causa al remover su contenido resuena con más fuerza de lo normal en la silenciosa estancia. Entretanto, tu mirada se ve atraída involuntariamente por los peculiares artefactos que ocupan la sala.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'avance parmi les mystérieux engins xénos et pose la main à la surface d'une structure étrange, semblable à un piédestal. Avec un sifflement, l'une de ses parois latérales s'ouvre aussitôt à la manière d'un sas. Quand le Drukhari se met à en inspecter le contenu, les bruits sourds d'objets brusquement déplacés résonnent dans le silence à couper au couteau. Pendant ce temps, votre regard dérive involontairement vers les appareils mystérieux dont la pièce est remplie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai strides among the mysterious xenos devices and presses his palm to one of the strange pieces resembling a pedestal — with a hiss, one of its sides suddenly opens like an airlock. The Drukhari begins to examine the contents of the container — the thuds and clangs of objects being moved about ring harshly in the otherwise silent space. Meanwhile, your eyes are involuntarily drawn to the peculiar devices that fill the room.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai läuft an den geheimnisvollen Xenos-Geräten vorbei und drückt mit seiner Handfläche auf einen der seltsamen Container, der einem Sockel ähnelt – erst zischt es und dann öffnet sich eine der Seiten wie eine Luftschleuse. Der Drukhari beginnt, den Inhalt des Containers zu durchsuchen – der ansonsten stille Raum wird vom Herumklimpern und Scheppern ausgefüllt. Derweil richtet sich dein Blick unbewusst auf die sonderbaren Geräten, die er aus dem Container wühlt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai strides among the mysterious xenos devices and presses his palm to one of the strange pieces resembling a pedestal — with a hiss, one of its sides suddenly opens like an airlock. The Drukhari begins to examine the contents of the container — the thuds and clangs of objects being moved about ring harshly in the otherwise silent space. Meanwhile, your eyes are involuntarily drawn to the peculiar devices that fill the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai läuft an den geheimnisvollen Xenos-Geräten vorbei und drückt mit seiner Handfläche auf einen der seltsamen Container, der einem Sockel ähnelt – erst zischt es und dann öffnet sich eine der Seiten wie eine Luftschleuse. Derweil richtet sich dein Blick unbewusst auf die sonderbaren Geräten, die er aus dem Container wühlt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, gizemli zeno cihazları arasında yürüyüp kaideyi andıran tuhaf parçalardan birine avucunu bastırıyor. Parçanın bir tarafı, hava kilidi misali tıslayarak açılıyor. Drukhari, konteynerin içindekileri incelemeye başlıyor. Hareket eden nesnelerin çıkardığı gümbürtü ve tınlamalar, normalde sessiz olması gereken ortamda şiddetle çınlıyor. Bu esnada bakışların, ister istemez odayı dolduran olağan dışı cihazlara çekiliyor.{/n}
